overview: Hi, My name is Muhammad Omair Iqbal. I am a Software Engineer at Techlogix Pvt Limited Pakistan. My professional interests are in Software Architecture Design, Development, Deployment. I am proficient in databases and looking forward MCTS in Sql Server Development. And also looking forward for experience in Business Intelligence. I personally like to work in Microsoft Technologies. And want to excel in Microsoft tools and Technologies.

degrees.subject: Computer Engineer
